Standard: 你相信眼前所看到的世界么？\n那个你再熟悉不过，每天赖以生存的世界?
EN: Do you believe in the world you see? \n The world you know well and live in every day?

Standard: 或许这一切都只不过是梦幻泡影。\n而真相远比你看到的要触目惊心。
EN: Maybe all this is just a pipe dream.\n The truth is far more shocking than what you see.

Standard: 这是一段纯粹虚构的故事，\n但或许透过它，你能看到世界的真相。
EN: It's a purely fictional story, \n but perhaps through it you can see the truth of the world.

Description: 故事主人公，IT软件设计师。王浩，单身，屌丝宅男。
